pkgmetadata.longdescription: Moran-Downton Bivariate Exponential Distribution // Provides 3D plots of the Moran-Downton bivariate exponential distribution (MDBED), generates bivariate random values, and also provides values of the joint and conditional PDFs and CDFs. Nagao M, Kadoya M (1971) http://hdl.handle.net/2433/124795. Balakrishna N, Lai CD (2009) doi:10.1007/b101765.
